name: protoreaction
description: A workspaces-based project framework for building apps using Preact and React from a single source

engines-comments.node: using nvm to install and manage node versions (most recent stable) (https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm): $ nvm  install --lts
engines-comments.npm: using nvm to install and manage npm versions (most recent stable) (https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm): $ nvm install-latest-npm

dependencies-comments.colors: library for CLI output text color and style formatting
dependencies-comments.minimist: library to support parsing of CLI-style args in NodeJS javascript modules
